title: Props to OCL/LPL casters
body:
I really enjoyed the casting from you guys on the weekend, I also wanted to give some props to Riot Cochese for the camera work :P. 
I hope that there is a way to feature both all the LPL games as well as the OPL games in the future that will allow the casters to do both.
Cheers guys, looking forward to next week
